Producer: Jody Girgenti, Marc Meyers, Adam Goldworm, Michael Merlob, Milan Chakraborty
Production Co: Ibid Filmworks, Attic Light Films, Aperture Entertainment
Rating: R (Disturbing Images|Brief Nudity|Teen Drug Use|Drinking|Language|Sexual Content)
Synopsis: The true, haunting story of young Jeffrey Dahmer -- the shy adolescent in high school who becomes a notorious serial killer years later.
Title: My Friend Dahmer
